content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello, Mary Smith. It's a pleasure to meet you. I am open to discussing the rental price of the apartment. Please make an offer, and we can negotiate from there.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. Based on the size of the apartment and its location, I was thinking of a price around $1,500 per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: I appreciate your offer, Mary. However, considering the current market trends and the amenities provided, I am looking for a price closer to $2,000 per month. Would you be willing to negotiate towards that number?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Your offer is quite a bit higher than what I had in mind, Mr. Heine. Could we meet somewhere in the middle, perhaps around $1,750? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Your counter-offer is more reasonable, Mary. I am willing to accept $1,750 per month as the rental price. We have a deal at $1,750.
name: Heinrich Heine
